ROOT.GetSplitKeys: SELECT keytext,keytype,1000.0,keygroup,standardtext,groupdata,keyid FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNametbSplitKey where confirmed>0 /*AND (keygroup not like 'd:%')*/ AND keyid>{0} ORDER BY keyid
ROOT.GetDataKeyGroup: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(KEYGROUP,3,LENGTH(KEYGROUP)) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameTBSPLITKEY WHERE KEYGROUP LIKE 'd:%'
ROOT.GetCololumnKeyText: SELECT DISTINCT keytext FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNametbSplitKey WHERE keygroup='d:{0}.{1}.{2}' ORDER BY keytext
ROOT.GetTopColumn: select colname from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNametbDataColumn where tblname={0} and colname not in ({{1}}) order by searchcount desc
ROOT.UpdateColumnSearchCount: update same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNametbDataColumn set searchcount=case when searchcount is null then 1 else searchcount+1 end where tblname={0} and colname={1}
ROOT.GetStationLocation: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}}) UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}}) UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}})
ROOT.GetLineInfo: SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0} UNION SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0}
ROOT.GetDeviceInfo: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN (SELECT ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_{0}_B WHERE ID IN ({1})) UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN (SELECT ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_{0}_B WHERE ID IN ({1})) UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN (SELECT ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_{0}_B WHERE ID IN ({1}))
ROOT.UpdateTableMainCols: update tbdatatable set maincols={2} where dsname={0} and tblname={1}
ROOT.GetAskHistory: SELECT TOP 5 QUESTION,ASKNUM FROM TBASKHISTORY WHERE USERNUM={0} AND ASKRESULT=1 AND ASKEXTEND='NULL' ORDER BY ASKNUM DESC,RECENTTIME DESC
ROOT.GetAskNum: SELECT ASKNUM FROM TBASKHISTORY WHERE USERNUM={0} AND QUESTION={1} AND ASKEXTEND={2}
ROOT.AddAskHistory: DELETE FROM TBASKHISTORY WHERE USERNUM={0} AND QUESTION={1} AND ASKEXTEND={2}; INSERT INTO TBASKHISTORY (USERNUM,QUESTION,ASKEXTEND,ASKNUM,ASKRESULT,RECENTTIME) VALUES ({0},{1},{2},{3},{4},GETDATE());
